title: WTB: T205 Sovereign Archer, Bates, and Beck
author: HercDriver

posts.post_title: WTB: T205 Sovereign Archer, Bates, and Beck
posts.post_content:
Does anyone have any of these three cards for sale or trade?  I haven't seen a Sovereign Beck yet, so if you have a back scan of that one, that would be helpful as well...at least I'd know it's out there!

Take Care,
Geno

I following card that I would be interested in trading.  Email me at [url]b.brownbaseball@verizon.net[/url].  Bill

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=52231&d=1324943227[/IMG]

Looks like a perfect Boxing Day present to myself!  Email enroute...

Take Care,
Geno

Geno,
They are out there. They are on my confirmed list so I must have seen back scans or held one at one point.

Joshua

Joshua --

I knew the Archer and Bates were available as a Sovereign, but the Beck has been elusive!

Take Care,
Geno
